Functions.html#/s:4Bits2eeoiSbAA12Reacha.abstract: Returns whether the two network status values are equal.

Classes/Reachability/NetworkStatus.html.name: NetworkStatus
Classes/Reachability/NetworkStatus.html.abstract: Defines the various states of network reachability.

Classes/Reachability/Connection.html.name: Connection
Classes/Reachability/Connection.html.abstract: Defines the various connection types detected by reachability flags.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: isReachableOnWWAN
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Whether the network is currently reachable over the WWAN interface (iOS).

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: isReachableOnEthernetOrWiFi
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Whether the network is currently reachable over Ethernet or WiFi interface.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: listener
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: A closure executed when the network reachability status changes.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: init()
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Creates a Reachability instance that monitors the address 0.0.0.0.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: init(hostName:)
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Creates a Reachability instance for a specified host name.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: init(hostAddress:)
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Creates a Reachability instance for a specified host address.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: makeReachabilityForInternetConnection()
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Creates a Reachability instance that monitors the address 0.0.0.0.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.name: makeReachabilityForLocalWiFi()
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:4Bits12Reac.abstract: Creates a Reachability instance that monitors IN_LINKLOCALNETNUM (that is, 169.254.0.0).

Classes/Reachability.html.name: Reachability
Classes/Reachability.html.abstract: The Reachability class listens for reachability changes of hosts and addresses for both WWAN and WiFi network interfaces.
